content=Located in the Sawridge Inn Peace River, this newly renovated eatery specializes in Canadian cuisine with a Northern touch. Start the day with their hearty breakfast fare. The extensive lunch & dinner menu features Pizza to go, and many other scrumptious dishes. A splendid lunch buffet is served Monday - Friday.
